info.title: Galaxy.ai Image API
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Galaxy.ai's comprehensive image generation, editing, and AI-powered visual tools platform.

## Authentication

All endpoints require dual header authentication:
- `x-secret-key`: Application secret key for API access
- `x-user-id`: User identifier for personalized operations

Both headers must be included in every API request.

## Credit System

Most operations consume credits based on complexity and AI model used. Credit costs range from 0.01M to 5M credits per operation. Insufficient credits return HTTP 402.

## Async Processing

Many endpoints return a `processId` for tracking long-running operations. Use the process ID to check completion status via webhooks or polling.

GalaxyAuth.name: x-secret-key
GalaxyAuth.description: Application secret key for authentication. Must be used together with x-user-id header.

UserAuth.name: x-user-id
UserAuth.description: User ID for authentication. Must be used together with x-secret-key header.

ImageModel.description: Available AI models for image generation and editing

processId.description: Unique process identifier for tracking async operations

creditsUsed.description: Number of credits consumed by the operation

usedCredits.description: Alternative field name for credits consumed

usedAmount.description: Alternative field name for credits consumed

processing.description: Indicates if the process is still running

tool.description: Specific tool identifier for specialized generation

prompt.description: Text description of the image to generate

negativePrompt.description: Text describing what to avoid in the image

guidanceScale.description: How closely to follow the prompt

requiredCredits.description: Alternative field name for required credits

availableCredits.description: Alternative field name for available credits

BadRequest.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or malformed request

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication headers

InsufficientCredits.description: Payment Required - Insufficient credits for operation

RateLimitExceeded.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded

InternalError.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected server error

post.description: Main image generation endpoint supporting 33+ AI models and specialized tools like YouTube thumbnails, social media posts, logos, etc.
Legacy v1 image generation endpoint with support for multiple AI models
Enhanced v2 image generation endpoint optimized for Ideogram v3, Gemini 2.5 Flash, and Seedream v4 models
Latest v3 image generation endpoint using FAL infrastructure for improved performance and model support

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of user's generated avatars with filtering by type

post.description: Create personalized avatars using AI based on reference images and style preferences

prompt.description: Description of the desired avatar style and appearance
prompt.example: A professional headshot with a friendly smile, wearing business attire

reference_image_url.description: URL of the reference image for avatar generation

guidance_scale.description: How closely to follow the prompt

negative_prompt.default: bad quality, worst quality, text, signature, watermark, extra limbs
negative_prompt.description: What to avoid in the generated avatar

post.description: Automatically remove backgrounds from images using AI-powered segmentation technology

image.description: URL of the image to process

model.description: AI model to use for background changing

preserveOriginalSubject.description: How much to preserve the original subject

lightSourceStrength.description: Light source strength for new background

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: View type - 'all' for admin view, 'user' for personal images

targetImage.description: URL of the image where the face will be replaced (input_image)

preserveExpression.description: Whether to preserve the target's facial expression

prompt.example: A modern tech company logo for 'TechCorp' with clean lines and blue colors
